title: Blown transformer leaves 4,000 Palo Alto residents without power
content: 02:22 PM PDT   Copyright 2018 Nexstar Broadcasting, Inc. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed.   PALO ALTO (KRON)- - Over 4,000 Palo Alto residents are without power this afternoon due to a blown transformer.   According to the Palo Alto Police Department, the outage was first reported around 1:08 p.m. and a total of 4,452 residents were impacted.   Crews from Palo Alto Utilities are at the scene. There's no estimated time of restoration.
